scripts.core:dev: cd rogue-boi-core && cargo watch -i .gitignore -i 'rogue-boi-core/pkg/*' -s 'wasm-pack build --target web --dev'
scripts.build: npm run core:build && npm run ui:build
scripts.build:dev: npm run core:build-dev && npm run ui:build
scripts.dev: cargo xtask copy-icons && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'npm run ui:dev' 'npm run core:dev'
scripts.bundle: cargo xtask copy-icons && npm run build && cargo xtask bundle
